04269cd7-1892-41db-9e69-eec54a5f59c1 }} '''{{Pagename nd}}''' is a {{lc:Quest item}} in {{poe2}}. ## Description {{Description |{{#var:description}}}} ## Acquisition {{#arraymap: {{#var:location}}|;|x|x|\n}} ## Usage * Can be used to prove that Condwen was cheating to [Unlucky Ancret](/unluckyAncret/) (after you inspect the dice). She will chase Snake Eyes off, leaving the entrance to the eastern ramparts open for [Blow the Man Down](/blowTheManDown/).
